title: 3PM
content:
Health Updates: aging & mitochondria dysfunction; PQQ (Pyrroloquinoline Quinone) & mitochondrial... <!--more--> biogenesis.
Commentary: the economy Thomas Elpel is a visionary philosopher akin to the transpersonal psychology tradition of consciousness studies, and an expert in sustainable living & wilderness survival skills.
He is the founder of Green University in Montana, a green business think tank, that educates and consults on restoring ecosystems & biodiversity, alternative building construction & sustainable business practices.
  “Roadmap to Reality: Consciousness, Worldviews & the Blossoming of the Human Spirit”, explores how various levels of the conditioned worldviews people assimilate during the developmental stages of their lives shape & compartmentalize the perception of themselves, others & the world we live in.
